warpStar.name: Warp Star
warpStar.description: A balanced, all-purpose machine with no major strengths or weaknesses.

compactStar.name: Compact Star
compactStar.description: Extremely boost-focused with low durability and lightweight handling.

wingedStar.name: Winged Star
wingedStar.description: Designed for superior flight and aerial control, but fragile in combat.

shadowStar.name: Shadow Star
shadowStar.description: Fast-boosting and agile, but extremely vulnerable to damage.

wagonStar.name: Wagon Star
wagonStar.description: Heavy and durable with no charge time, ideal for sustained encounters.

slickStar.name: Slick Star
slickStar.description: High grip and smooth handling make it excel on technical terrain.

formulaStar.name: Formula Star
formulaStar.description: The fastest machine available, built purely for speed over safety.

bulkStar.name: Bulk Star
bulkStar.description: Extremely powerful and tough, but completely lacks boost capability.

rocketStar.name: Rocket Star
rocketStar.description: Straightforward performance with strong boost and moderate durability.

swerveStar.name: Swerve Star
swerveStar.description: Nearly uncontrollable with absurd boost output and almost no grip.

turboStar.name: Turbo Star
turboStar.description: Excels in turning and endurance but suffers from extremely long charge time.

jetStar.name: Jet Star
jetStar.description: Balanced flight-focused machine with solid mobility and survivability.

wheelieBike.name: Wheelie Bike
wheelieBike.description: A bike-type machine with strong balance between speed, durability, and control.

rexWheelie.name: Rex Wheelie
rexWheelie.description: A heavy-duty wheelie with exceptional toughness and strong combat presence.

wheelieScooter.name: Wheelie Scooter
wheelieScooter.description: Light and responsive with excellent grip, but limited survivability.

hopStar.name: Hop Star
hopStar.description: A nimble star with strong lift and balanced overall performance.

vampireStar.name: Vampire Star
vampireStar.description: Trades speed for endurance, thriving in drawn-out engagements.

paperStar.name: Paper Star
paperStar.description: Extremely fragile but capable of rapid movement and evasive play.

chariot.name: Chariot
chariot.description: Extremely heavy and durable, sacrificing agility for raw staying power.

battleChariot.name: Battle Chariot
battleChariot.description: A reinforced chariot built for combat dominance and extreme durability.

tankStar.name: Tank Star
tankStar.description: Extremely heavy and stable with high survivability but limited mobility.

bullTank.name: Bull Tank
bullTank.description: An even heavier tank variant focused on offense and sheer momentum.

transformStar.name: Transform Star
transformStar.description: A flexible machine that balances flight and ground performance.

transformBike.name: Transform Bike
transformBike.description: A transform-capable bike emphasizing maneuverability over defense.

dragoon.name: Dragoon
dragoon.description: A legendary machine with unmatched gliding, top-tier speed, and massive aerial control. Difficult to acquire but overwhelmingly powerful.

hydra.name: Hydra
hydra.description: A brutal legendary machine built for raw destructive power. Extremely heavy, explosive acceleration, and catastrophic offense.

Leo.name: Leo
Leo.description: A lion formed from the will power of the rider

flightWarpStar.name: Flight Warp Star
flightWarpStar.description: A star built for maximum flight capabilities.
